{{BLP sources|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Bjørn Berge | image = Bjoern Berge 1999.jpg | caption = | image_size = | background = non_vocal_instrumentalist | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|mf=yes|1968|9|23}} | birth_place = [[Sveio]], [[Norway]] | instrument = [[Guitar]] | genre = [[Blues]] | occupation = [[Musician]], [[Songwriter]] | label = | website = {{URL|http://www.bjorn-berge.com}} | }} '''Bjørn Berge''' (born in Sveio, Norway on 23 September 1968) is a [[Norway|Norwegian]] guitarist and [[blues music|blues]] artist. After being name "Best Musician of the Year" by ''[[Dagbladet]]'' in 1998, In 2001, he won [[Spellemannprisen]] for his album ''Stringmachine'' and in 2002 for his album ''Illustrated Man''.[http://www.farmenas.com/bjorn_berge/bjornBerge.htm Farmenas: Bjørn Berge biography] He also toured allover Europe gaining more popularity. He also won ''NBFs Bluespros'' in 2001. ==Discography== {| class="wikitable" !align="center" rowspan="2" width="10"|Year !align="center" rowspan="2" width="160"|Album !align="center" colspan="1" width="20"|Peak positions !align="center" rowspan="2" width="80"|Certification |- !width="20"|[[VG-lista|NOR]]
